Desc.entry: Neighbourhood action group for Shirecliffe, works in partnership with residents, local Councillors and Sheffield Homes to improve the Shirecliffe area. Also runs Shirecliffe Community Centre. Registered charity and Company limited by guarantee no 05334100.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-9pm (office times); weekly and alternate months (board meetings)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 5
